TopicTitle: Kerbal Com Sat 1 - 1st KASA spacecraft into orbit.

Articles.Content:
Hello everybody!

I decided to open a new Youtube channel, calling it KASA (Kerbal Aeronautic and Space Administration) with the intent of post several videos mostly about unmanned ehm... unkerbaled exploration. My plan is to post, blueprints of my probes and rockets as well video footage from the spacecrafts themselves. I will approach exploration gradually and release a video for each mission i'll do providing also science data. My intent is to use also black and white cameras / videos until i reach a certain point in this exploration path. Anyways, here's my first KASA video, thanks for watching and I hope you like it!

Edited October 3, 2015 by Epox75
